message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE

This paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) and specifically focuses on measuring semantic similarity between words. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (LG), which makes cs.IR and cs.LG likely sub-categories as well. Additionally, the use of a computerized thesaurus and NLP systems suggests the involvement of artificial intelligence (AI) and neural networks (NE), making cs.AI and cs.NE possible sub-categories.
